txt.en: 'Staddle's the perfect place to live... close enough to the big city to get whatever you need, but still nice and quiet!'
'If you're going into Bree, don't go at night. It ain't safe! If you must, bring a friend to watch your back.'
'Don't go wandering too far east! You're like to get caught up in the Midgewater Marshes. Awful, smelly bogs!'
